summary: This is an email from Swiss federal police (fedpol) to a US counterpart, forwarding a request from the cantonal police of Wallis regarding Mark Epstein. Mark Epstein contacted Swiss police claiming to have discovered threats and a potential link between his brother Jeffrey Epstein's death and the disappearance of Karl Erivan Haub. The Swiss authorities are seeking information and assessment from US authorities.

keyFacts: Mark Epstein, brother of Jeffrey Epstein, contacted Swiss police in June 2020 claiming to have received death threats against his children from an unknown person called 'Mim Mim'.
Mark Epstein alleged a possible connection between Jeffrey Epstein's death and the 2018 disappearance of German billionaire Karl Erivan Haub, suggesting both may have been murders.
Emails provided by Mark Epstein claim 'Mim Mim' received hush money from Buss Leander (an alleged security officer) and sold documents.
Swiss authorities found no indications that Haub's disappearance was due to a violent crime but are seeking information and an assessment of Mark Epstein's claims from US authorities.
The document is a formal information request from Swiss federal police to US authorities, indicating international law enforcement coordination on this matter.
